stories.Title: The GPT Store is opening soon!
stories.Description: An email sent to developers working on GPTs has revealed that OpenAI's long-awaited GPT Store is finally launching next week, following a series of delays due to the company's upheaval last November.
stories.Tweet: The GPT Store is opening soon! 📦 An email sent to developers working on GPTs has revealed that OpenAI's long-awaited GPT Store is finally launching next week, following a series of delays due to the company's upheaval last November. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2024/01/04/openais-app-store-for-gpts-will-launch-next-week/

stories.Title: A treasure within
stories.Description: Astrobotic's upcoming launch is not only remarkable for the possibility of making history but also for the variety of the Peregrine lander's cargo, from NASA instruments to physical Bitcoin.
stories.Tweet: A treasure within 📦 Astrobotic's upcoming launch is not only remarkable for the possibility of making history but also for the variety of the Peregrine lander's cargo, from NASA instruments to physical Bitcoin. #rocketscience https://interestingengineering.com/culture/instruments-bitcoin-dna-peregrine-lunar-lander

stories.Title: Reaching new heights
stories.Description: Looking to expand its reach in space exploration, China has completed a new launch pad that will serve as a space gateway for both national and commercial ventures.
stories.Tweet: Reaching new heights 📦 Looking to expand its reach in space exploration, China has completed a new launch pad that will serve as a space gateway for both national and commercial ventures. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/china-completes-new-commercial-launch-pad-to-boost-access-to-space/

stories.Title: Be part of the journey
stories.Description: Psst! Want a boarding pass for NASA's VIPER mission? You're in luck—the space agency is offering a fun opportunity to launch your name to the moon aboard the groundbreaking rover.
stories.Tweet: Be part of the journey 📦 Psst! Want a boarding pass for NASA's VIPER mission? You're in luck—the space agency is offering a fun opportunity to launch your name to the moon aboard the groundbreaking rover. #space https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/fly-your-name-to-the-moon-as-part-of-historic-nasa-mission/

stories.Title: Unified energy
stories.Description: Tesla and Samsung team up to merge their ecosystem for energy connectivity. Tesla's latest API update, now with Powerwall and solar integration, supports Samsung's SmartThings Energy app.
stories.Tweet: Unified energy 📦 Tesla and Samsung team up to merge their ecosystem for energy connectivity. Tesla's latest API update, now with Powerwall and solar integration, supports Samsung's SmartThings Energy app. #samsung https://electrek.co/2024/01/05/tesla-annouces-partnership-samsung-energy-connectivity/

stories.Title: Google presents AutoRT
stories.Description: As robots become increasingly integrated into our daily lives, Google DeepMind is actively working to ensure their functionality while promoting safety and a better understanding of tasks.
stories.Tweet: Google presents AutoRT 📦 As robots become increasingly integrated into our daily lives, Google DeepMind is actively working to ensure their functionality while promoting safety and a better understanding of tasks. #robotics https://www.businessinsider.com/google-deepmind-rules-ai-robots-safer-in-your-home-2024-1

stories.Title: Without a bang
stories.Description: Are we closer to a Sonic revival? NASA and Lockheed Martin are gearing up to unveil the X-59 Quesst, a supersonic jet that aims to be quietly powerful while breaking the sound barrier.
stories.Tweet: Without a bang 📦 Are we closer to a Sonic revival? NASA and Lockheed Martin are gearing up to unveil the X-59 Quesst, a supersonic jet that aims to be quietly powerful while breaking the sound barrier. #NASA https://www.space.com/nasa-x-59-quiet-supersonic-jet-rollout-livestream

stories.Title: Precise and sophisticated
stories.Description: With more companies entering the humanoid robot arena, Tesla's Optimus still has work to do. China's Kepler recently unveiled Forerunner, emerging as a strong competitor with its advanced movements.
stories.Tweet: Precise and sophisticated 📦 With more companies entering the humanoid robot arena, Tesla's Optimus still has work to do. China's Kepler recently unveiled Forerunner, emerging as a strong competitor with its advanced movements. #robotics https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/chinese-humanoid-robot-fight-tesla-optimus

stories.Title: A real tech extravaganza
stories.Description: Las Vegas is set to become a giant tech party at CES 2024. From January 9th to 12th, we have front-row tickets to a bunch of launches. In fact, they have already started.
stories.Tweet: A real tech extravaganza 📦 Las Vegas is set to become a giant tech party at CES 2024. From January 9th to 12th, we have front-row tickets to a bunch of launches. In fact, they have already started. #tech https://www.theverge.com/2024/1/5/24025489/ces-2024-tv-transportation-laptops-smart-home-what-to-expect

stories.Title: Bye bye cookies!
stories.Description: Third-party cookies are a thing of the past for nearly 30 million Chrome users. This move comes from Google's Privacy Sandbox project, aimed at enhancing security during browsing.
stories.Tweet: Bye bye cookies! 📦 Third-party cookies are a thing of the past for nearly 30 million Chrome users. This move comes from Google's Privacy Sandbox project, aimed at enhancing security during browsing. #google https://www.engadget.com/google-has-started-disabling-third-party-cookies-for-chrome-users-060955481.html

title: GPT Store is coming, Astrobotic’s lunar cargo, A trip with NASA’s VIPER
description: Your number-one destination for customized GPTs is about to open! After a little delay thanks to OpenAI’s rollercoaster, all signs point to the launch happening next week. You've probably heard about Astrobotic’s Peregrine lander set for a lunar journey on January 8th. Well, there's a bunch of cool stuff going with it—scientific gear, souvenirs, and even Bitcoin! Also, if you want to jump on the lunar bandwagon, NASA is giving you a chance to put your name on the VIPER mission. I've already got my ticket!
